hotels.name: Kisawa
hotels.desc: Luxury island sanctuary celebrating local design culture on 5km of pristine coastline
hotels.longDesc: An island sanctuary on Benguerra Island maximizing privacy while showcasing rich design culture that celebrates local craftsmanship across five kilometers of pristine coastline.
hotels.address: Kisawa Sanctuary Benguerra Island Inhambane, 1304, Mozambique

hotels.name: Polana Serena Hotel
hotels.desc: Iconic beachfront luxury hotel, colonial elegance, ocean views, fine dining
hotels.longDesc: Maputo's most prestigious hotel combines colonial charm with modern luxury, featuring beautiful gardens and direct beach access perfect for families seeking comfort and culture.

hotels.name: Beira Terrace Hotel
hotels.desc: Modern beachfront resort, family suites, swimming pool, coastal views
hotels.longDesc: Contemporary beachfront hotel in Beira offering spacious family accommodations, a large pool area, and easy beach access ideal for relaxing seaside vacations.

hotels.name: Nahyeeni Lodge
hotels.desc: Boutique island retreat, secluded bungalows, pristine beaches, marine sanctuary
hotels.longDesc: A tranquil island escape with charming bungalows nestled among palm trees, perfect for families seeking pristine beaches and snorkeling adventures away from crowds.

hotels.name: Mango Beach Resort
hotels.desc: Budget-friendly beach resort, whale shark diving hub, relaxed atmosphere, family rooms
hotels.longDesc: Casual beachside accommodation known for whale shark season tourism and diving opportunities. Offers great value with family-friendly amenities and laid-back coastal vibes.

restaurants.name: Laurentina
restaurants.desc: Fine dining establishment, Portuguese cuisine, elegant ambiance, ocean views
restaurants.longDesc: Sophisticated dining venue showcasing refined Portuguese and Mediterranean flavors in an elegant setting, perfect for a memorable family dinner with professional service.
restaurants.address: Av. Conde de Valbom 71A, 1050-067 Lisboa, Portugal

restaurants.name: Peri-Peri Divers | B&B | Morrungulo
restaurants.desc: Casual beachfront eatery, grilled seafood, local Mozambique flavors, family-friendly
restaurants.longDesc: Relaxed seaside restaurant specializing in freshly grilled fish and prawns with authentic local spices, offering casual comfort food that families enjoy after beach adventures.

restaurants.name: Vanilla Gelado Italiano
restaurants.desc: Historic cafÃ©, traditional pastries, strong coffee, local gathering spot
restaurants.longDesc: A beloved Maputo institution serving excellent coffee and traditional pastries in a charming vintage setting, ideal for morning breaks and people-watching with the family.
restaurants.address: Fomento, No. 730, 6 Av. Antonio Champalimauo, Maputo, Mozambique

restaurants.name: Zambi
restaurants.desc: Local restaurant, traditional Mozambican dishes, authentic spices, casual atmosphere
restaurants.longDesc: Authentic local eatery serving traditional Mozambican cuisine with bold spices and fresh ingredients, offering families genuine cultural dining experiences at reasonable prices.

restaurants.name: Mercado de Peixe
restaurants.desc: Bustling fish market with fresh grilled seafood and local atmosphere

restaurants.name: andBeyond Benguerra Island
restaurants.desc: Private beach dining experience with grilled prawns and local specialties

restaurants.name: Verdinho Restaurante
restaurants.desc: Popular seafood restaurant in Maputo known for prawns and Portuguese-Mozambican cuisine

restaurants.name: Dhow Restaurant and Art Gallery
restaurants.desc: Waterfront restaurant in Maputo serving seafood and Mozambican cuisine

restaurants.name: Casa Elefante
restaurants.desc: Contemporary Mozambican cuisine in a restored colonial mansion

restaurants.name: RESTAURANTE KARIBU FILICHA
restaurants.desc: Popular restaurant in Maputo serving Mozambican and international cuisine

experiences.name: Museu Nacional de Arte
experiences.desc: Contemporary art museum, local artists, architectural exhibitions, cultural space
experiences.longDesc: Modern museum showcasing Mozambican contemporary art, design, and architecture. Interactive galleries and changing exhibitions engage families in discovering local creative talent.
experiences.address: 2HMC+7PV, Av. Ho Chi Min, Maputo, Mozambique

experiences.name: Saint Sebastian Fort
experiences.desc: UNESCO World Heritage fortress, 16th century architecture, historical significance, museum
experiences.longDesc: An impressive 16th-century Portuguese fortress on historic Mozambique Island, featuring museums and panoramic views. Families explore layers of maritime history and colonial architecture.

experiences.name: Bazaruto Archipelago National Park
experiences.desc: Marine protected area, whale sharks, pristine islands, snorkeling and diving paradise
experiences.longDesc: A spectacular protected archipelago offering world-class snorkeling, diving, and whale shark encounters. Families experience incredible marine biodiversity and untouched island landscapes.

experiences.name: Gorongosa National Park
experiences.desc: Wildlife reserve, safari experiences, African fauna, scenic landscapes, guided tours
experiences.longDesc: Mozambique's premier wildlife destination featuring guided safaris through savanna landscapes. Families encounter elephants, lions, and zebras in their natural habitat on thrilling adventures.

experiences.name: Azura Benguerra Island
experiences.desc: Private beach picnic arranged by the resort with fresh seafood and tropical fruits

experiences.name: Sunset Dhow Safari
experiences.desc: Gentle sail on traditional dhow boat suitable for young children

experiences.name: Two Mile Reef
experiences.desc: Famous coral reef and beach area off Benguerra Island, popular for snorkeling and beach activities

experiences.name: Costa do Sol
experiences.desc: Popular beachfront area in Maputo with restaurants and ocean views

experiences.name: Feira de Artesanato, Flores e Gastronomia de Maputo
experiences.desc: Craft market in Maputo with local artisan goods and souvenirs
experiences.photoAttribution: Feira de Artesanato, Flores e Gastronomia de Maputo
experiences.address: Av. dos MÃ¡rtires da Machava, Maputo, Mozambique

kidFriendly.name: Reef Resort Xai-Xai
kidFriendly.desc: Beautiful sandy beach, shallow lagoon, calm waters, family beach activities
kidFriendly.longDesc: Pristine beach with calm lagoon waters perfect for young swimmers, sunbathing, and beach games. Family-friendly atmosphere with safe shallow areas and stunning sunset views.

markets.name: Central Market
markets.desc: Central market, fresh produce, local crafts, vibrant atmosphere, authentic experience
markets.longDesc: Maputo's bustling central market buzzing with energy and color, offering fresh tropical fruits, vegetables, local handicrafts, and authentic Mozambican cultural immersion for families.

a.name: Mozambique Island Paradise (8 Days)
a.description: Pristine beaches, gentle whale shark encounters, and barefoot luxury designed for families who want African adventure without the safari schedule.
